meanings.definition: Intricate designs or patterns, typically of flowers, foliage, or geometric shapes.
meanings.sent1: The room was adorned with beautiful arabesks on the walls.
meanings.sent2: She admired the arabesks on the ancient vase.
meanings.sent3: The playful kitten chased after the arabesks of light dancing on the floor.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a whirlwind of arabesks, each thought intertwining with the next.
meanings.sent5: The artist's brush effortlessly brought the arabesks to life on the canvas.

meanings.definition: To decorate with intricate designs or patterns.
meanings.sent1: She decided to arabesks the borders of the invitation cards.
meanings.sent2: The craftsman carefully arabesksed the wooden chest.
meanings.sent3: The chef wanted to arabesks the cake with colorful icing swirls.
meanings.sent4: His words arabesksed the page, creating a vivid picture in the reader's mind.
meanings.sent5: The tailor would arabesks the fabric with delicate embroidery.

meanings.definition: A style of decoration characterized by intricate designs or patterns.
meanings.sent1: The palace was known for its opulent arabesks throughout the halls.
meanings.sent2: The fashion designer incorporated arabesks into the new collection.
meanings.sent3: The garden was a whimsical display of arabesks in every corner.
meanings.sent4: Her speech was filled with arabesks, captivating the audience with each word.
